videos.headline: Israel Abanikanda runs a kickoff back 98 yards for a Pitt TD
videos.description: Pitt responds to Virginia's game-tying touchdown immediately as Israel Abanikanda takes the ensuing kickoff to the house.

videos.headline: Jordan Addison makes spectacular play on 4th TD catch of the day
videos.description: Jordan Addison makes a catch under duress, spins out of a tackle and breaks free for his fourth touchdown of the game.

videos.headline: Jordan Addison makes 4 TD catches as Pitt holds off Virginia
videos.description: Kenny Pickett and Jordan Addison connect for four touchdown passes as No. 18 Pittsburgh beats Virginia 48-38.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Jordan Addison makes 4 TD catches as Pitt holds off Virginia) 2021/11/20 ESHEET Sotfull
